definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Jordan valley, near ford, Buhl:Geogr. 181; exact site known; Jos 3:16 (Kaqiairein, LXX of L Kariaqiareim), 1Ki 7:46 (Seira, LXX of L Sarqan) = [[חְרֵדָ֫תָה]] 2Ch 4:17 (Aname [i.e. a)na\ me/son] sirdaqai; Sa(ri)daqa; is Chr right?); [[חָֽרְחַ֫נׇה]] 1Ki 4:12 (Sesaqan, LXX of L Sarqan)—cf. [[חְרֵרָתָה]] Ju Jdg 7:22, appar. same place; identity with [[חְרֵדָה]] 1Ki 11:26 is usually assumed, but not proven.
